org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.helpers.StatementBuilder

  • Packages that use StatementBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.helpers
    Package for mostly static helper code to work with data objects.

      Starts the construction of a Statement with the given subject.
      protected StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.getThis() 
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withId(String statementId)
      Sets the id for the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withNoValue()
      Sets the main snak of the statement to be a {NoValueSnak.

      Adds a qualifier Snak to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withQualifierNoValue(PropertyIdValue propertyIdValue)
      Adds a NoValueSnak qualifier with the given property to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withQualifiers(List<SnakGroup> qualifiers)
      Adds all qualifiers from the given list of SnakGroup to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withQualifiers(SnakGroup qualifiers)
      Adds all qualifiers from the given SnakGroup to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withQualifierSomeValue(PropertyIdValue propertyIdValue)
      Adds a SomeValueSnak qualifier with the given property to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withQualifierValue(PropertyIdValue propertyIdValue, Value value)
      Adds a qualifier with the given property and value to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withRank(StatementRank rank)
      Sets the rank for the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withReference(Reference reference)
      Adds a reference to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withReferences(List<? extends Reference> references)
      Adds a list of references to the constructed statement.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withSomeValue()
      Sets the main snak of the statement to be a {SomeValueSnak.
      StatementBuilder StatementBuilder.withValue(Value value)
      Sets the main value for the constructed statement.
